room_title: Escape room "Save The Mountain!" by Vail Valley Escape Room in Avon
room_address: 110 E Beaver Creek Blvd Suite 201 Avon, CO 81620
room_description: Beloved Henry Beaver, the owner of our treasured ski resort, has just passed away leaving the future of the mountain uncertain. His two sons - the only heirs - are fighting over the ski hill, but there is rumored to be a revised will in Henryâ€™s old ski shop. The fate of the mountain is in your hands as you work to retrieve the hidden will without being caught.
